feed.title: friedmag’s Fried Brain
feed.subtitle: Development news and thoughts from friedmag (Gary Friedman).

entry.title: First Post, and announcing Mobile Toolbox for YNAB!

link.title: First Post, and announcing Mobile Toolbox for YNAB!

entry.content:
I’m finally putting it out there - Mobile Toolbox for YNAB is a mobile web-app (eventually an installable PWA app) that allows account reconciliation, additional account metadata for more detailed/advanced savings tracking, and some basic credit card reward features. More to come!

Find it @ https://budget.friedmag.com/
entry.summary: I’m finally putting it out there - Mobile Toolbox for YNAB is a mobile web-app (eventually an installable PWA app) that allows account reconciliation, additional account metadata for more detailed/advanced savings tracking, and some basic credit card reward features. More to come!
